fixes.name: Netted T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR initialSum = SUMX(
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR] = "R",
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)] * -1,
        IF(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR] = "RR",
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)],
            0
        )
    )
)
RETURN
initialSum - SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[fixed netting (T)])
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau SUM(IF ...) to a SUMX over the table with nested IFs to apply the row-level sign logic, then subtracted the SUM of 'fixed netting (T)'. All column references converted to 'Table'[Column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The original Tableau formula uses aggregation (SUM) and table-level calculations, so it must be created as a measure in Power BI.
